transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hanji good morning sir main India Mart se baat kar rahi hun Koyma Nimesh.
Customer: Hanji boliye.
Executive: Hanji meri baat Raj ji se ho rahi hai.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Sir yahan aapki profile aayi thi to aapke product mein kuch changes karne the.
Customer: Kya changes karne the?
Executive: Ye aapke kuch products jo hain jisme low score dikha rahe hain. Wedding carry bag kya aap isme deal kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Konsi cheez mein?
Executive: Wedding wedding carry bag.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aur thela?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Okay silk potli.
Customer: Han potli karte hain khali.
Executive: Potli mein deal kar rahe hain sir iska fabric kya hai?
Customer: Cotton velvet velvet bhi hai silk bhi hai cotton bhi hai.
Executive: Okay okay aur sir ye pouch bag mein deal kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Achcha pouch bag mein nahi kar rahe hain aur ye carry bag?
Customer: Carry bag mein nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Okay okay to sir iski services kaisi chal rahi hai aapki?
Customer: Chal chal rahi hai badi bekar chal rahi hai.
Executive: Bekar kaise chal rahi hai sir iske leads aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Lead kaha aa rahi hai jo main jo product hamare uski to aa nahi pa rahi faltu ki cheeze aayi ja rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha kis se related lead aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Kis se related lead aa rahi hai jaise ki aap bol rahe hain na ki jis hamare product se related lead nahi aa rahi hai to bataenge aapko kaisi lead aa rahi hai?
Customer: Alag alag bhi tarah ki aa rahi hai jo chahiye hamara jo product hai same wo product ki to aa nahi rahi.
Executive: Main product kya hai sir aapka?
Customer: Potli hai hamari potli ke andar karte hain to potli mein aa nahi raha.
Executive: Aapki potli ye hai yahan aapke pass packing bags ki wo aayi hai lead abhi char ghante ye potli bags ki lead hai to hai sir char ghante pehle ye aapne dekhi?
Customer: Abhi baitha hun abhi dekh raha hun.
Executive: Theek hai chaliye main call pe hun aap dekhiye agar dekh rahe hain to baki main aapko aur bata rahi hun. Aapko orders kaise milte hain bulk mein milte hain orders aapki order value kya hai? Ye order kaha mil rahe hain mam order mil kaha rahe hain wo maine paise dekar fasa diye hain theek hai? Nahi sir fasa nahi diye hain aapne. Nahi maine main kya bataun ab aapko humne to paise ek bari aapne ab le liye hum to fas gaye ab karenge kya fas gaye to fas gaye ab kya bataun aapko main bola to bada lamba chauda tha aapke pass ye aayega wo aayega kuch nahi aa raha. To aapko kis location se related lead aa rahi hai?
Customer: Jo potli hai to potli ke andar bhi jo aana chahiye wo to nahi aa raha alag alag product aa rahe hain jo hamara hai wo cheez aa nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Jo aapka product hai usse nahi aa rahi hai okay let me check your product and category.
Customer: Kar lo kitni bar check karoge kitni bar phone aaya kitni bar check karoge. Nahi nahi sir check nahi kar rahi main sahi kar rahi hun is cheez ko jisse jisse aapke pass sahi kar rahe ho usse pehle bhi madam ka phone aaya tha usse pehle bhi sir ka phone aaya tha sahi kar rahe hain ab sahi karte rahoge order bhi bej doge kuch keh rahe the aapke pass daily ye phone aa jayega bhai ji konsa phone aaya mere pass ek adhar phone keh rahe the na ki apne aap aa jate hain phone ha ji iske liye apne aap hi call aate hain jab aapko lagta hai na humko lagta hai ki aapke pass leads sahi nahi aa rahi hai to aapke catalog mein changes kar dete hain jiske pass jaisa aapke pass product chahiye waise hi lead aati hai usi se related lead aati hai hum wo product add kar dete hain uska naam change kar dete hain. Kar lo mam humne to ye saal chalana hai agle saal chalana nahi hai jo chal gaya kyuki humne dekh liya mam iska koi response hai nahi pure mahine mein ek aada koi lead niklegi to nikal gayi aise thodi kam hota hai pure mahine mein ek aadi cheeze le lo. Consume kab karte hain aap yahan daily active rehte hain? Aapke pass nayi inquiries bhi aayi hui hain. Hamare matlab ki nahi hai wo inquiry aapke matlab ki nahi hai achcha bas product se related aapke pass irrelevant aa rahi hai kya aapka potli ki leads nahi aa rahi hai? Hmm. Okay chaliye main isko ye karke aapki potli ke bag ki hi aapki primary category add kar deti hun. Jisse aapke pass potli ki hi lead aayegi. Just hold on sir.

Executive: Yes sir humne yahan pe category add kar di hai aapke pass ab potli ki hi leads aayengi. Abhi ek do din mein daily daily aap active rahiyega daily daily valid consume kijiyega fir uski leads aayengi aapke pass. Theek hai. Okay fir hum call karenge aapko koi aur dikkat nahi to.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads for potli bags.

- Feels money was wasted on subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive added potli bag as primary category.

- Asked customer to stay active daily.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call if any issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, category
